story_99_00603/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh? Is that the Patience Badge you’ve got there?
You’re stronger than you look, it seems.
story_99_00603/2401_1001_0200_10:
You have two more badges left to acquire. Keep
working your way to the PML tournament matches!
story_99_00603/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’ll be waiting in Champion Stadium to test those
skills of yours and see if they still hold up!
